comments.body: looks like it is still partially broken

Yes, but now it also has real changes. I felt I could be picky about encoding issues when that was the only change, but ultimately I think having the correct versions is more important than not having a couple badly encoded characters. So in my estimation, worth merging despite the issue. I'll let you make the final call, though.
yeah you’re right. I don’t really care about the encoding stuff.
